title: Essential oils natural remedies : the complete A-Z reference of essential oils for health and healing.
author: Author Notes Loading Author Notes
description: The healing properties of essential oils are virtually limitless. You can put them to work today without the hassle, expense, and frustration that come with consulting doctors and taking prescription medicines. Essential Oils Natural Remedies offers essential oils practitioners of all levels a comprehensive home reference for a lifetime of health-related needs.
